column4: I only have one problem with my Ubuntu install i'm stuck with 800x600 when it should do 1024x768 it's a ati rage xl on a proliant server.. any ideas? thanks.
this will probably be an unpopular suggestion but "find some nVidia card and use that".  ATI drivers are notorious for being a pain in the butt
You should either be able to, or it'll shut it off on it's own once the BIOS sees another video card installed in a PCI socket
